formatted_address: 31 Toh Guan Rd E, #03-02 LW Techno Centre, Singapore 608608
name: Bean Bag Mart

reviews.text: Bean bags are firm and retain shape. Although my 1st purchase didnt last the first month, they repaired and reinforced my bean bag for free. Good service.

Did my purchase of 3 bean bags today. Was served by Daniel and Jenny, and I would say I am impressed by their professionalism and helpfulness that you can’t walk out of their shop empty-handed.
The beanbags are of good quality and comfy. Definitely would recommend them to my families or friends planning to get bean bags.

Not only is the product excellent with great quality but the service was impeccable!  Shout out to Daniel for the help and quick response
and an overall positive and relaxing experience.

Dropped by looking for 1 bean bag, they had many options which were so comfortable we left with 2! Very soft and good support for the neck and back. The owners were very nice and helpful in recommending us types and colours. Great experience, thank you! :)

Bought a super comfy bean bag from Jenny. Very knowledgeable and accommodating to my fussy requests. She spent almost an hour to explain bean bags in great details no rush. Very well made with lotsa thoughts given to their design for both comfort and flexibility. That is what a bean bag should be! Love it. ⭐⭐⭐

vicinity: 31 Toh Guan Road East, #03-02 LW Techno Centre
